bwwExcerpt: The Angel's introduction is as grand as the come, and that's fitting for such a grand revival of Angels in America. Twenty-five years ago, the play was important and relevant-and in the age of Trump, it might be moreso, on both counts, today. But the reason it persists, the reason companies will stage this work for decades to come, is that it's first and foremost great, riveting drama. And its time has come-again.

keyPhrases.quote: But the reason it persists, the reason companies will stage this work for decades to come, is that it's first and foremost great, riveting drama.
